author: rhuijben
msg: Avoid an extra db operation for fetching conflicts in the open, add and
delete operations of the update editor.
open_file): Fetch conflicted boolean from read_info and only
call node_already_conflicted to confirm if the markers are
still there if read_info says that there is conflict data.
